refactor: enforce $2.00 budget minimum with mandatory loop gate (R#144) — E sessions were consistently ending under-budget ($1.43-$1.81) despite nominal $2.00 gate. Replaced permissive table with pseudocode loop, added spend targets by stage, and explicit platform exhaustion documentation requirement. Impact category: session-file (PREFER). Pipeline healthy (4 pending, 3 ideas). Still neglecting: E session cost compliance will need monitoring over next 3-5 E sessions.
